plot: Our hero, John Gray, is seen leaving his old mother and starting off to make a fortune in the gold mines in Colorado. We next see him and his companion digging for gold and finding nuggets....
title: The Temptation of John Gray
plot_es: Our hero, John Gray, is seen leaving his old mother and starting off to make a fortune in the gold mines in Colorado. We next see him and his companion digging for gold and finding nuggets....
plot_en: Our hero, John Gray, is seen leaving his old mother and starting off to make a fortune in the gold mines in Colorado. We next see him and his companion digging for gold and finding nuggets....
